main event: Multiple sightings of unusual aerial phenomena near Cochise, New Mexico in the 1950s, involving bright hovering objects and rapid accelerations.
interesting points: The sightings involved bright, reddish, or silvery colored objects, some of which appeared to be disc-shaped and emitting smoke or fumes.
Reports indicated rapid and vertical acceleration of the objects, as well as their sudden disappearance from view.
Witnesses described seeing the objects hovering for several minutes before accelerating away at high speeds.
Some objects were observed to be very bright, with apparent sizes compared to coins, and were seen by multiple people at once.
The sightings involved credible witnesses such as pilots and military personnel, and the investigation was undertaken by Project Blue Book, an official government program for UFO investigations.
photographs: no photographs available in the report
